Headline: #50 Damen Temporary Southbound Reroute near Clark/Bryn Mawr
ShortDescription: Southbound 50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Foster, Ashland, over regular route, due to street blockage near Clark/Bryn Mawr

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #50 Damen buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Foster, Ashland, over regular route, due to street blockage near Clark/Bryn Mawr.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Addison
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Addison due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at Addison due to police activity. 

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
